thread.title: Gentry: Tyreke Evans could miss 6-8 weeks with knee injury
thread.title_full: Gentry: Tyreke Evans could miss 6-8 weeks with knee injury

title: Gentry: Tyreke Evans could miss 6-8 weeks with knee injury
text:
Gentry: Tyreke Evans could miss 6-8 weeks with knee injury USA Today Sports Oct 21, 2015 at 6:19p ET 0Shares 
The Pelicans are the trendy pick to make a leap in the standings this season, but the health issues that have plagued them in the past are present once again. 
The latest injury is one to the knee of Tyreke Evans , who needed arthroscopic surgery to repair it and is expected to miss the next couple of months. true Alvin Gentry says Tyreke Evans (knee scope) could be out 6-8 weeks as Pelicans injuries pile up and Anthony Davis' concern/burden grows. â€” Michael Wallace (@MyMikeCheck) October 21, 2015 
Evans was an ironman of sorts for New Orleans last year, appearing in 79 games and averaging 17.5 points, 5.5 rebounds and 2.5 assists per contest. It's not a great sign that he's scheduled to miss time to begin the upcoming season. MORE NEWS: Want stories delivered to you? Sign up for our NBA newsletters. 0
